mapper.select: select id, role_name as roleName, description, create_time as createTime from role_info where role_name LIKE "%"#{roleName}"%"
SELECT ri.id, ri.role_name as roleName FROM `role_info` AS ri LEFT JOIN user_role AS ur ON ri.id = ur.role_info_id LEFT JOIN user_info AS uri ON ur.user_info_id = uri.id WHERE uri.id = #{userId}
